nav.div: Dover Union Free School District » COVID-19 Updates and Information

div.div: The following is a dedicated page for Parents/Guardians to receive updates from the Dover Union Free School District on COVID-19 related information:

div.h3: Communications from the Superintendent of Schools:

p.span: Click the links below to access letters from Michael Tierney, Superintendent of Schools regarding the Corona Virus.

March 16, 2020 - English
16 de Marzo 2020 - Spanish
March 27, 2020 - English
27 de Marzo, 2020 - Spanish

li.p: FIRST RESPONDER / HEALTH CARE WORKER CHILDCARE REQUEST FORM -
Use this form to request childcare if you are a First Responder or an Emergency Health Care Provider
​DUTCHESS COUNTY STATE OF EMERGENCY CLOSURE QUESTIONNAIRE FORM:

If you have questions for the Dover Administration regarding the Dutchess County State of Emergency Closure, please use this form to ask your questions. Mr. Tierney will answer questions in future correspondence to the parents and community.
